Module com.github.sormuras.bach
Package com.github.sormuras.bach.tool

Class Command.Builder

java.lang.Object
com.github.sormuras.bach.tool.Command.Builder
Enclosing class:
Command
public static final class Command.Builder extends Object
A builder for building Command objects.

Example usage: 


 var command = Command.builder("name")
     .with("first-argument")
     .with("option", "value")
     .build();

A Builder checks the components and invariants as components are added to the builder. The rationale for this is to detect errors as early as possible and not defer all validation to the build() method.
